author: Special Correspondent
text:
Demanding own building for Mano College at Sankarankovil, students struck work on Wednesday and submitted a petition in the Sankarankovil taluk office.

Ever since the came into existence, it was functioning either from rented buildings or in godown-like structures, much to the agony of the students. After this issue was taken up with Minister for Higher Education Palaniappan during one of his visits, a land was identified on Sankarankovil outskirts for constructing the college buildings.

Alleging that this land is situated 10 km away from the town, the students struck work on Wednesday.

“Government poromboke lands are available near the bus stand and the railway station. Hence, officials should earmark one of these two lands” the students said.

Tahsildar Lakshmanan, who held talks with the protesting students in the presence of Deputy Superintendent of Police Selvaraj, informed them that talks with Registrar of Manonmaniam Sundaranar University would be held soon after identifying a suitable land.
title: Mano College students strike work for building
